@nrk/core-icons

Icons should be used in dimensions 15x15, 21x21 or 30x30. For easier usage, caching and cross-domain compability, icons are loaded by including <script src="nrk-icons.js"></script> in the top of <body>. Circlular buttons can be used for single icons nrk-button nrk-button--o.
